long_description: Updated with a lighter, more user-friendly design, The North Face Terra 65 Pack has a sleek, slimmed-down style that improves load management and reduces overall pack weight by more than half a pound. Fully redesigned Opti Fit(TM) suspension features a refined, anatomical harness with mesh-lined hipbelt; vertical channel on the deluxe mesh back panel adds ventilation. Aluminum V-stays transfer load weight to the waist; polyethylene framesheet enhances support and provides protection. Huge zippered side entry to the main compartment, separate sleeping bag compartment and 7 well-placed pockets offer easy access to necessities when you're on the move. Hydration sleeve lets you carry plenty of water (reservoir sold separately). The North Face Terra 65 Pack also features compression straps, trekking pole loops, lash points and tool loops to secure extra gear onto the pack's exterior.
short_description: Updated with a lighter, more user-friendly design, The North Face Terra 65 Pack has a sleek, slimmed-down style that improves load management and reduces overall pack weight by more than half a pound.
